page.title: 08CAERWYS YOUTH
page.content: Extracts taken from the 1985 Carnival Programme dedicated to the youth of Caerwys. Representative members of youth organisations gave their views in a questionaire (average age 11-12) {FAVOURITE SPARE TIME OCCUPATION}T.V. {MOST POPULAR T.V. PROG.}Soap Operas.{ {MARRIAGE.}The majority approved of marriage.{20%}had mixed feelings.{ {ATTENDING CHURCH OR CHAPEL.}80% attened .16% of these found it boring. 13% were actively anti church/chapel and the rest were undecided. {POLITICS/POLITICIANS.}26% did not reply. 26% did not like the Prime Minster Thatcher.20% thought politics boring. 13% found it interesting.7% were staunch 'tories'.7% thought it"a load of rubbish".{NUCLEAR ARMS}67% were opposed to nuclear weapons,just over 26% had no thoughts on the subject and 6% were for them.
